predictions.sentence: If you wonder why BTC is at $120k when ETH has only just now approached it's previous ATH, it's because people still have no clue.
predictions.author: hipaces

predictions.sentence: He'd had a feeling this day would come, he just didn't expect ETH to climb to $5,000 this soon.
predictions.author: HITMAN616

predictions.sentence: Cowen has ETH topping at $5k this cycle.
predictions.author: im_THIS_guy
